description: Nice and clean status about your server.

item.filter: Host name of Zabbix agent running

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	it.name AS 'name field',
	it.itemid,
	h.name AS hostname,
	i.location AS geohash,
	i.location_lat as latitude,
	i.location_lon as longitude,
	ht.value AS metric
FROM
	hosts h,
	items it,
	host_inventory i,
	history_uint ht
WHERE
	it.hostid = h.hostid
AND it.name LIKE '%ping%'
AND h.name LIKE '%Zabbix%'
AND h.hostid = i.hostid
AND ht.itemid = it.itemid
AND clock BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW());

panels.description: The amount of disk devices in the system
panels.title: Disk drives

panels.description: This item is the percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive was busy servicing read or writes requests.
panels.title: $Disk (Performance)

panels.description: This item is the percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive was busy servicing read or writes requests.
panels.title: Disk sdb (Performance)

title: Zabbix - Full Server Status
